monsters.name: Acid Slime (L)
monsters.notes: Splits if HP is 50% or below (makes two new slimes with current HP). Slimes go into discard pile.
monsters.ai: When not splitting, approximately a 40-30-30 probability split between #wCorrosive #wSpit, #wTackle, and #wLick. #wLick cannot be used twice in a row, and the other moves cannot be used three times in a row.

monsters.name: Acid Slime (M)
monsters.notes: Slimes go into discard pile.
monsters.ai: When not splitting, approximately a 40-40-20 probability split between #wCorrosive #wSpit, #wTackle, and #wLick. #wLick cannot be used twice in a row, and the other moves cannot be used three times in a row.

monsters.name: Acid Slime (S)
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wLick, and then alternates between the two moves.

monsters.name: Bear
monsters.ai: Starts with #wBear #wHug, and then alternates between #wLunge and #wMaul

monsters.name: Blue Slaver
monsters.ai: 40% chance to use #wRake, but cannot #wStab 3 times in a row or #wRake twice in a row

monsters.name: Book of Stabbing
monsters.ai: 15% chance to #wSingle #wAttack except the #wMulti-Attack cannot be used 3 times in a row, and the #wSingle #wAttack cannot be used twice in a row
monsters.notes: Innate #uPainful #uStabs. #rT = Turn Number + 1

monsters.name: Byrd
monsters.ai: Cannot use #wSwoop on turn 1. When flying, has a 50-20-30 split between #wPeck, #wSwoop, and #wCaw. #wPeck cannot be used three times in a row, and #wSwoop and #wCaw cannot be used twice in a row. When knocked down, is #w(Stunned), then uses #wHeadbutt, and then #w(Start #wFlying).
monsters.notes: Innate #uFlight #u4

monsters.name: Centurion
monsters.ai: While the Mystic is alive, 65% chance to #wDefend, 35% chance to #wSlash. Once the Mystic dies, #wDefend is replaced by #wFury.
monsters.notes: Uses #wDefend on itself if it was about to use #wDefend and the Mystic dies.

monsters.name: Chosen
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wHex. Then alternates between either #wDebilitate or #wDrain (50% each) and then between #wZap or #wPoke (40% #wZap : 60% #wPoke).

monsters.name: Cultist
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wIncantation. Then repeats #wDark #wStrike.

monsters.name: Darkling
monsters.ai: On turn 1, 50% chance of either #wNip or #wHarden. Afterwards, has a 30-40-30 split between #wNip, #wChomp, and #wHarden, but #wHarden and #wChomp both cannot be used twice in a row, and #wNip cannot be used three times in a row. The middle Darkling cannot #wChomp and has a 50-50 split instead. When half-dead, uses #w???, followed by #wReincarnate.
monsters.notes: Innate #uLife #uLink. #rD is randomly chosen from [9, 13] at the start of the fight.

monsters.name: Exploder
monsters.ai: #wAttacks twice, and then #wExplodes, doing 30 damage in the explosion if not killed.
monsters.notes: Innate #uExplode #u3

monsters.name: Fat Gremlin
monsters.ai: #wSmash every turn.
monsters.notes: Innate #uExplode #u3

monsters.name: Fungi Beast
monsters.ai: 60% chance of #wBite, but cannot #wBite three times in a row, or #wGrow twice in a row.
monsters.notes: Innate #uSpore #uCloud #u2 (Applies #dVuln #d2 on death)

monsters.name: Giant Head
monsters.ai: For the first 3 turns, has a 50-50 split between #wCount and #wGlare, but cannot use either move three times in a row. Afterwards, repeats #wIt #wIs #wTime.
monsters.notes: Innate #dSlow. #rT starts at 0 and increases by 5 each time #wIt #wIs #wTime is used, up to a maximum of 30.

monsters.name: Gremlin Leader
monsters.ai: With 0 allies alive, has a 75-25 split between #wRally and #wStab. With 1 ally, has a 50-50 split between #wRally and #wStab if the last move was #wEncourage, and a 62.5-37.5 split between #wRally and #wEncourage if the last move was #wStab. With more than 1 ally, has a 66-34 split between #wEncourage and #wStab. Cannot use any move twice in a row.

monsters.name: Gremlin Nob
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wBellow. Then cycles in the order: #wSkull #wBash -> #wRush -> #wRush.

monsters.name: Gremlin Wizard
monsters.ai: #wCharge for 2 turns, and then repeats #wUltimate #wBlast.

monsters.name: Jaw Worm
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wChomp. Afterwards, has a 45-30-25 split between #wBellow, #wThrash, and #wChomp, but cannot use #wThrash three times in a row or #wChomp or #wBellow twice in a row.
monsters.notes: The act 3 version of Jaw Worm follows the same splits but does not always start with #wChomp. This harder version has the effects of #wBellow from the start.

monsters.name: Lagavulin
monsters.ai: After waking up, cycles in the order: #wAttack -> #wAttack -> #wSiphon #wSoul.
monsters.notes: Innate #bBlock #b8, #uMetallicize #u8. Wakes up in 3 turns or from damage. Loses the #uMetallicize when awoken. If encountered in the [?] floor, skip directly to #wSiphon #wSoul.

monsters.name: Looter
monsters.ai: #wMugs twice, then a 50% chance to #wLunge. After (or in place of) the #wLunge, uses #wSmoke #wBomb, and then #wEscape.
monsters.notes: Innate #uThievery #u20.

monsters.name: Red Louse
monsters.ai: 75% chance of #wBite, and 25% chance of #wGrow, but cannot #wGrow twice in a row or #wBite 3 times in a row.
monsters.notes: Innate #uCurl #uUp #uC, where #uC is random [9, 12]. #rD is randomly chosen in [6, 8] at the start of the fight.

monsters.name: Green Louse
monsters.ai: 75% chance of #wBite, and 25% chance of #wGrow, but cannot #wSpit #wWeb twice in a row or #wBite 3 times in a row.
monsters.notes: Innate #uCurl #uUp #uC, where #uC is random [9, 12]. #rD is randomly chosen in [6, 8] at the start of the fight.

monsters.name: Mad Gremlin
monsters.ai: Always uses #wScratch.
monsters.notes: Innate #uAngry #u2.

monsters.name: The Maw
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wRoar. Afterwards and after using #wDrool, has a 50-50 split between #wSlam and #wNom. If used #wSlam, then has a 50-50 split between #wNom and #wDrool. Always uses #wDrool after #wNom.
monsters.notes: #rT = Turn number / 2 (rounded up)

monsters.name: Mugger
monsters.ai: #wMugs twice, then a 50% chance to #wLunge. After (or in place of) the #wLunge, uses #wSmoke #wBomb, and then #wEscape.
monsters.notes: Innate #uThievery #u20.

monsters.name: Mystic
monsters.ai: If there is 21 HP to heal, uses #wHeal (up to twice in a row). Otherwise, has a 60% chance of #wAttack #w/ #wDebuff and a 40% chance of #wBuff. #wAttack #w/ #wDebuff cannot be used twice in a row, and #wBuff cannot be used three times in a row.

monsters.name: Nemesis
monsters.ai: On turn 1, has a 50% chance of #wBurn or #wMulti-Attack. Afterwards, has a 35-35-30 split between #wBurn, #wMulti-Attack, and #wScythe, except #wScythe and #wBurn cannot be used twice in a row, and #wMulti-Attack cannot be used three times in a row.
monsters.notes: Every second turn, gain 1 #uIntangible. Burns go into the discard pile.

monsters.name: Orb Walker
monsters.ai: Has a 60-40 split between #wLaser and #wClaw, but neither move can be used three times in a row.
monsters.notes: Innate #uStrength #uUp #u5. #wLaser's debuff puts one burn in the draw pile and the other in the discard pile.

monsters.name: Pointy
monsters.ai: Always #wAttacks.

monsters.name: Red Slaver
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wStab. Then, has a 25% chance of using #wEntangle until it is used. If #wEntangle has not been used yet, cycles in the order of #wScrape -> #wStab. Otherwise, has a 45% chance of #wStab and 55% chance of #wScrape, except #wStab cannot be used three times in a row and #wScrape cannot be used twice in a row.

monsters.name: Reptomancer
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wSummon. Otherwise, has an equal chance of all 3 moves, except cannot use #wSnake #wStrike twice in a row, #wSummon 3 times in a row, or #wBig #wBite twice in a row. Cannot #wSummon with 4 daggers alive (66-34 split between #wSnake #wStrike and #wBig #wBite in that case).

monsters.name: Dagger
monsters.ai: Uses #wStab and then #wExplode.
monsters.notes: Wounds go into the discard pile.

monsters.name: Repulsor
monsters.ai: 20% chance of #wAttack and 80% chance of #wDebuff. Cannot #wAttack twice in a row.
monsters.notes: Dazes go into the draw pile.

monsters.name: Romeo
monsters.ai: Starts with #wMock. Afterwards, cycles in the order of #wAgonizing #wSlash -> #wCross #wSlash -> #wCross #wSlash.

monsters.name: Sentry
monsters.ai: In a 3-Sentry encounter, the Sentries start with #wBolt / #wBeam / #wBolt. In the Sentry + Spheric Guardian encounter, the Sentry starts with #wBolt. Always alternates between the two moves.
monsters.notes: Innate #uArtifact #u1. Dazes go into the discard pile.

monsters.name: Shelled Parasite
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wFell. Has a 40-40-20 split between #wDouble #wStrike, #wSuck, and #wFell, but #wDouble #wStrike and #wSuck cannot be used three times in a row and #wFell cannot be used twice in a row.
monsters.notes: Innate #uPlated #uArmor #u14. #wStunned if #uPlated #uArmor is broken.

monsters.name: Shield Gremlin
monsters.ai: #wProtects random allies until none remain, and then uses #wShield #wBash.

monsters.name: Snake Plant
monsters.ai: 65% chance of #wChomp and 35% chance of #wEnfeebling #wSpores, until #wEnfeebling #wSpores is used. Then, cycles in the order of #wChomp -> #wChomp -> #wEnfeebling #wSpores.
monsters.notes: Innate #uMalleable #u3.

monsters.name: Sneaky Gremlin
monsters.ai: Always uses #wPuncture.

monsters.name: Snecko
monsters.ai: Starts with #wPerplexing #wGlare. Then, 40% chance of #wTail #wWhip and 60% chance of #wBite, but cannot #wBite three times in a row.

monsters.name: Spheric Guardian
monsters.ai: Starts with #wActivate, followed by #wAttack #wDebuff. Then, alternates between #wSlam and #wHarden.
monsters.notes: Innate #uBarricade. Innate #bBlock #b40. Innate #uArtifact #u3.

monsters.name: Spiker
monsters.ai: 50% chance of each action, but cannot #wAttack twice in a row. Cannot use #wBuff once it has been used 6 times.
monsters.notes: Innate #uThorns #u7.

monsters.name: Spiked Slime (L)
monsters.ai: Has 30-70 probability between #wFlame #wTackle and #wLick, though #wLick cannot be used twice in a row and #wFlame #wTackle cannot be used three times in a row. Will #wSplit once it reaches half its max HP, producing 2 slimes of its current HP.
monsters.notes: Slimes go into the discard pile.

monsters.name: Spiked Slime (M)
monsters.ai: Has 30-70 probability between #wFlame #wTackle and #wLick, though #wLick cannot be used twice in a row and #wFlame #wTackle cannot be used three times in a row.
monsters.notes: Slimes go into the discard pile.

monsters.name: Spiked Slime (S)
monsters.ai: Always uses #wTackle.

monsters.name: Spire Growth
monsters.ai: Always uses #wConstrict unless it was used last turn or if the player is already #dConstricted. Otherwise, has a 50-50 chance to use #wQuick #wTackle or #wSmash, but cannot use either three times in a row.

monsters.name: Spire Shield
monsters.ai: Every 3 turns starting from turn 3, uses #wSmash. Otherwise, has an equal chance of either using #wBash followed by #wFortify or #wFortify followed by #wBash.
monsters.notes: Innate #uArtifact #u2. #dStat is the player's strength unless they have at least 1 orb slot (in which case it is 50% strength down, 50% focus down).

monsters.name: Spire Spear
monsters.ai: Always starts with #wBurn #wStrike. Every 3 turns starting with turn 2, uses #wSkewer. Otherwise, has an equal chance to either use #wBurn #wStrike followed by #wPiercer or #wPiercer followed by #wBurn #wStrike.
monsters.notes: Innate #uArtifact #u2. Burns go on top of the draw pile.

monsters.name: Taskmaster
monsters.ai: Always uses #wScouring #wWhip.
monsters.notes: Wounds go into the discard pile.

monsters.name: Transient
monsters.ai: Always uses #wAttack.
monsters.notes: Innate #dFading #d6. Innate #dShifting. #rX = 10 * (Turn Number - 1)

monsters.name: Writhing Mass

details.d0: Permanently add a Parasite to deck (future combats)

monsters.ai: For the first move, has an approximately equal chance of using the #wMulti-Attack, #wSingle-Attack, and #wAttack #w/ #wDebuff. Then, has about a 10-30-20-30-10 split between #wParasite, #wAttack #w/ #wDefend, #wAttack #w/ #wDebuff, #wMulti-Attack, and #wSingle-Attack, but can only (successfully) use #wParasite once each combat. The same move cannot be used (or rerolled) twice in a row.
monsters.notes: Innate #uMalleable #u3. Innate #uReactive.

monsters.name: Awakened One
monsters.ai: Phase 1: Always begins with #wSlash. Then, has 25% chance of using #wSoul #wStrike and a 75% chance of using #wSlash, except #wSoul #wStrike cannot be used twice in a row and #wSlash cannot be used three times in a row. Becomes half-dead and uses #wRebirth upon hitting 0 hp. NL NL Phase 2: Always begins with #wDark #wEcho. Then, 50-50 chance of using #wSludge or #wTackle, except neither can be used three times in a row.
monsters.notes: Innate #uRegen #u15. Innate #uCuriosity #u2. Innate #uStrength #u2. Loses #uCuriosity and cleanses debuffs upon entering phase 2. Voids go into the draw pile.

monsters.name: Bronze Automaton
monsters.ai: Starts with #wSpawn #wOrbs. Then, cycles deterministically through #wFlail -> #wBoost -> #wFlail -> #wBoost -> #wHYPERBEAM -> #wBoost.
monsters.notes: Innate #uArtifact #u3.

monsters.name: Bronze Orb
monsters.ai: Has a 75% chance of using #wStasis until it has been used. Otherwise, has a 70% chance of using #wSupport #wBeam and a 30% chance of using #wBeam, but cannot use the same move three times in a row.
monsters.notes: #wStasis always steals a random card of the highest rarity in your draw pile (or discard pile, if the draw pile is empty).

monsters.name: The Champ
monsters.ai: Every 4 turns, uses #wTaunt. Otherwise, approximately 30-0-25-45 probability split between #wDefensive #wStance - #wGloat - #wFace #wSlap - #wHeavy #wSlash. No move can be used twice in a row, and #wDefensive #wStance cannot be used more than 2 times total. When attempting to use an invalid move, will use the next move in the order of #wDefensive #wStance -> #wGloat -> #wFace #wSlap -> #wHeavy #wSlash -> #wFace #wSlap. NL NL After dropping below 50% HP, the Champ will use #wAnger (not shown), which will cleanse all debuffs and add #uStrength #u12. Then, next turn and every three turns thereafter, uses Execute.

monsters.name: The Collector

details.d0: Spawn Torch Heads in Empty Slots (max 2)

monsters.ai: Always begins with #wSpawn. On turn 4, always uses the #wMega-Debuff. Otherwise, if a Torch Head is dead, has approximately a 25-45-30 probability split between #wRevive - #wFireball - #wBuff. If all Torch Heads are alive, the split becomes 70 - 30 between #wFireball - #wBuff. Cannot use #wRevive or #wBuff twice in a row, or #wFireball three times in a row.

monsters.name: Torch Head
monsters.ai: Always uses #wTackle.

monsters.name: Corrupt Heart
monsters.ai: Starts with #wDebilitate. Every 3 turns (starting turn 4), uses #wBuff. Otherwise, has an equal chance of either using #wBlood #wShots followed by #wEcho or #wEcho followed by #wBlood #wShots. NL NL Additional Buffs go in order as follows: #uArtifact #u2, #uBeat #uOf #uDeath #u1, #uPainful #uStabs, #uStr #u10, and then repeats of #uStr #u50.
monsters.notes: Innate #uInvincible #u200. Innate #uBeat #uOf #uDeath #u2. #wDebilitate shuffles in one of each status card into the draw pile.

monsters.name: Donu
monsters.ai: Starts with #wCircle #wOf #wPower, and then alternates between the two moves.
monsters.notes: Innate #uArtifact #u3.

monsters.name: Deca
monsters.ai: Starts with #wBeam, and then alternates between the two moves.
monsters.notes: Innate #uArtifact #u3. Dazes go into the Discard pile.

monsters.name: The Guardian
monsters.ai: Always cycles in the order of #wCharge #wUp -> #wFierce #wBash -> #wVent #wSteam -> #wWhirlwind. The fight always begins with #wCharge #wUp. After using #wTwin #wSlam in defensive mode, #wWhirlwind is used next. NL NL Upon entering defensive mode, it uses #wClose #wUp (not shown), which gives #uSharp #uHide #u4. Then, it proceeds to #wRoll #wAttack -> #wTwin #wSlam and return to offensive mode with #wWhirlwind.
monsters.notes: After receiving ( 40 + 10 * #rX ) damage, gains #b20 #bBlock and immediately enters Defensive Mode. #rX is the number of such transitions that have occured.

monsters.name: Hexaghost
monsters.ai: Starts with #wActivate, then  #wDivider. Afterwards, cycles in the order #wSear -> #wTackle -> #wSear -> #wInflame -> #wTackle -> #wSear -> #wInferno.
monsters.notes: #rH = (Player's Current HP / 12) + 1. Burns go into the discard pile.

monsters.name: Slime Boss

details.d0: Split into Spike Slime (L) and Acid Slime (L)

monsters.ai: Cycles in the order #wGoop #wSpray -> #wPreparing -> #wSlam. Will #wSplit into two slimes when the current HP is 50% or below, using the current HP as the new maximum HP values.
monsters.notes: Slimes go into the discard pile.

monsters.name: Time Eater
monsters.ai: Always uses #wHaste once, immediately after reaching below 50% HP. Otherwise, approximately a 20-45-35 probability split between #wRipple, #wReverberate, and #wHead #wSlam, except #wRipple and #wHead #wSlam cannot be used twice in a row, and #wReverberate cannot be used three times in a row.
monsters.notes: Slimes go into the discard pile.
